## ApiNamespaceAria2.getVersion() method

This method returns the version of aria2 and the list of enabled features.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getVersion(): Promise<VersionInfo>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[VersionInfo](./aria2.versioninfo.md)<!-- -->&gt;
